name: Coding Sensei
Gira
mes:
Write me regex that finds and replaces
AB❤
...
XYZ❤

With

AB.❤
...
XYZ.❤

name: Coding Sensei
mes:
Sure, here is a JavaScript example using regex to find and replace:

```
const text = `
AB❤
text in between
XYZ❤
`;

const result = text.replace(/(AB|XYZ)❤/g, '$1.❤');

console.log(result);
```

This will output:
```
AB.❤
text in between
XYZ.❤
```
swipes:
